title: Something is wrong with league
body: Myself and everyone i know and even randoms have been having issues with league, you select a skin and then it doesnt activate, it started just in TB but now its happeneing in normals as well, can a red please comment on if this is a known bug

replies.body:
lol bumps, they don't work on the boards because not everyone has that setting activated

I've also gotten this issue, though reselecting the skin after selecting another one seems to fix it.
